revised_title: Floral Mechanism and Evolution of Welwitschia mirabilis
tldr: This article explores the floral mechanism and evolution of the unique plant species, Welwitschia mirabilis. It discusses the plant's anthostrobiloid condition, xerophytic adaptations, and the role of entomophily in its reproductive process. The study also examines the structural features of the flowers and the working mechanism of the staminal tube in the sterile flower.
